languages.text: "Перед казнью она попросила о разговоре с капитаном Кляйном. Уж не знаю, что за скверную ложь она ему наболтала, но... сломался старик. Сначала явился на вахту нетрезвый, а затем... Упился ротгатом до смерти. Такого ветерана потеряли из-за этой стервы".

"Before her execution, she asked to speak to Captain Klein. I do not know what lies she told him, but the old man snapped. First, he showed up to watch duty in his cups, and then he drank himself to death on rotgut. We lost a good veteran because of that conniving rat."
languages.original_text: "Перед казнью она попросила о разговоре с капитаном Кляйном. Уж не знаю, что за скверную ложь она ему наболтала, но... сломался старик. Сначала явился на вахту нетрезвый, а затем... Упился ротгатом до смерти. Такого ветерана потеряли из-за этой стервы".

traits.locale_text: "Before her execution, she asked to speak to Captain Klein. I do not know what nasty lies she told him, but the old man snapped. First he showed up on watch in his cups, and then drank himself to death on rotgut. We lost a veteran because of that vile hag."

"Before her execution, she asked to speak to Captain Klein. I do not know what nasty lies she told him, but the old man snapped. First he showed up on watch in his cups, and then drank himself to death on rotgut. We lost a veteran because of that vile hag."

"Before her execution, she asked to speak to Captain Klein. I do not know what nasty lies she told him, but the old man snapped. First, he showed up to watch duty in his cups, and then he drank himself to death on rotgut. We lost a good veteran because of that vile hag."

"Before her execution, she asked to speak to Captain Klein. I do not know what nasty lies she told him, but the old man snapped. First, he showed up to watch duty in his cups, and then he drank himself to death on rotgut. We lost a good veteran because of that vile hag."

"Before her execution, she asked to speak to Captain Klein. I do not know what lies she told him, but the old man snapped. First, he showed up to watch duty in his cups, and then he drank himself to death on rotgut. We lost a good veteran because of that conniving rat."

"Before her execution, she asked to speak to Captain Klein. I do not know what lies she told him, but the old man snapped. First, he showed up to watch duty in his cups, and then he drank himself to death on rotgut. We lost a good veteran because of that conniving rat."

"Before her execution, she asked to speak to Captain Klein. I do not know what lies she told him, but the old man snapped. First, he showed up to watch duty in his cups, and then he drank himself to death on rotgut. We lost a good veteran because of that conniving rat."

languages.text: "Vor ihrer Exekution wollte sie mit Captain Klein sprechen. Ich weiß nicht, welche Lügen sie ihm erzählt hat, aber der alte Mann hat sie geglaubt. Erst ist er betrunken zu seiner Schicht angetreten, dann hat er sich zu Tode gesoffen. Wir haben wegen dieser hinterlistigen Ratte einen guten Veteran verloren."
languages.original_text: "Before her execution, she asked to speak to Captain Klein. I do not know what lies she told him, but the old man snapped. First, he showed up to watch duty in his cups, and then he drank himself to death on rotgut. We lost a good veteran because of that conniving rat."

traits.locale_text: "Vor ihrer Exekution wollte sie mit Captain Klein sprechen. Ich weiß nicht, welche Lügen sie ihm erzählt hat, aber der alte Mann hat sie geglaubt. Erst ist er betrunken zu seiner Schicht angetreten, dann hat er sich zu Tode gesoffen. Wir haben wegen dieser hinterlistigen Ratte einen guten Veteran verloren."

languages.text: « Avant son exécution, elle a demandé à parler au capitaine Klein. Je ne sais pas ce qu'elle lui a raconté, mais ce pauvre vieux s'est effondré. D'abord, il s'est présenté à son poste ivre mort, et ensuite, il s'est achevé à coups de tord-boyaux. Nous avons perdu un vétéran aguerri par la faute de cette peste sournoise. »
languages.original_text: "Before her execution, she asked to speak to Captain Klein. I do not know what lies she told him, but the old man snapped. First, he showed up to watch duty in his cups, and then he drank himself to death on rotgut. We lost a good veteran because of that conniving rat."

traits.locale_text: « Avant son exécution, elle a demandé à parler au capitaine Klein. Je ne sais pas ce qu'elle lui a raconté, mais ce pauvre vieux s'est effondré. D'abord, il s'est présenté à son poste ivre mort, et ensuite, il s'est achevé à coups de tord-boyaux. Nous avons perdu un vétéran aguerri par la faute de cette peste sournoise. »

languages.text: «Antes de la ejecución, solicitó hablar con el capitán Klein. Ignoro qué clase de embustes le contaría, pero el anciano perdió la cabeza. Primero se presentó borracho al turno de guardia, y después siguió dándole al aguardiente hasta morir. Perdimos a un buen veterano por culpa de esa rata traicionera».
languages.original_text: "Before her execution, she asked to speak to Captain Klein. I do not know what lies she told him, but the old man snapped. First, he showed up to watch duty in his cups, and then he drank himself to death on rotgut. We lost a good veteran because of that conniving rat."

traits.locale_text: «Antes de la ejecución, solicitó hablar con el capitán Klein. Ignoro qué clase de embustes le contaría, pero el anciano perdió la cabeza. Primero se presentó borracho al turno de guardia, y después siguió dándole al aguardiente hasta morir. Perdimos a un buen veterano por culpa de esa rata traicionera».

languages.text: 「処刑を前にして、彼女はクライン中隊長と話したいと言いました。どんな噓をついたのかは知りませんが、あの老人は逆上しました。最初は当直勤務に酔っぱらったまま現れ、その後、彼は死ぬまで安酒を飲み続けたのです。あの狡猾なネズミのせいで、我々は優秀な古参を失いました」
languages.original_text: "Before her execution, she asked to speak to Captain Klein. I do not know what lies she told him, but the old man snapped. First, he showed up to watch duty in his cups, and then he drank himself to death on rotgut. We lost a good veteran because of that conniving rat."

traits.locale_text: 「処刑を前にして、彼女はクライン中隊長と話したいと言いました。どんな噓をついたのかは知りませんが、あの老人は逆上しました。最初は当直勤務に酔っぱらったまま現れ、その後、彼は死ぬまで安酒を飲み続けたのです。あの狡猾なネズミのせいで、我々は優秀な古参を失いました」

languages.text: “行刑之前，她要求和克莱因上尉说几句话。我不知道她说了什么谎，但那个老家伙崩溃了。他站岗的时候开始酗酒，后来灌了一肚子私酿烈酒，把自己灌死了。都怪那只狡猾的臭老鼠，害得我们失去了一位出色的老兵。”
languages.original_text: "Before her execution, she asked to speak to Captain Klein. I do not know what lies she told him, but the old man snapped. First, he showed up to watch duty in his cups, and then he drank himself to death on rotgut. We lost a good veteran because of that conniving rat."

traits.locale_text: “行刑之前，她要求和克莱因上尉说几句话。我不知道她说了什么谎，但那个老家伙崩溃了。他站岗的时候开始酗酒，后来灌了一肚子私酿烈酒，把自己灌死了。都怪那只狡猾的臭老鼠，害得我们失去了一位出色的老兵。”

languages.text: "İdamından önce Komutan Klein'la konuşmak istedi. Ona ne yalanlar söyledi bilmiyorum ama ihtiyar adamın aklı başından gitti. Önce nöbet görevine sarhoş geldi, sonra da groksöldüren içe içe öldü. O sinsi sıçan yüzünden iyi ve deneyimli bir askeri kaybettik."
languages.original_text: "Before her execution, she asked to speak to Captain Klein. I do not know what lies she told him, but the old man snapped. First, he showed up to watch duty in his cups, and then he drank himself to death on rotgut. We lost a good veteran because of that conniving rat."
